sentences.sContent: Put your rubbish in the bin.
But you know how it is with us human you take something good you dissect it scrutinise it time and again not believing your good fortune and finally cast it to the "no" bin.
sentences.sContent_eng: But you know how it is with us human you take something good you dissect it scrutinise it time and again not believing your good fortune and finally cast it to the "no" bin.
sentences.sCn: 可是你知道的，对我们人类来说，你以为某件事物很好、你仔细分析它、细看它一次又一次，不相信你的好运，最后又把它丢到「不」的箱子里（不再理它），这真是很消极又愚蠢的。

phrases.pCn: 锅顶仓，吊挂箱；舱顶行李箱
贮仓，储料仓；缓冲仓；平衡料仓

words.tran: [数] 二进制的；二元的，二态的
把…扔进垃圾箱；装箱（bin的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: a large container for storing things, such as goods in a shop or substances in a factory
